amendment.description: To increase funding for oversight of grant programs and operations of the National Institutes of Health.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3950 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3950 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Blunt to Amendment SA 3695. (consideration: CR S5904; text: CR S5904) To increase funding for oversight of grant programs and operations of the National Institutes of Health.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3950 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Blunt to Amendment SA 3695.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3950 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
